title: Web fingerprints: expand rules and favicon hashing
body: Expand header/meta/body rules, add optional favicon hashing (e.g., mmh3) and emit structured tags in web-scan output.

title: Scan: add host-level concurrency with global QPS
body: Introduce --host-concurrency and validate global token-bucket QPS across all hosts/ports.

title: UDP: SNMP sysName/sysObjectID, DNS version.bind, NTP refid
body: Extend udp-probe to query additional lightweight fields and parse responses into JSON.

title: Banner: --max-redirects and TLS handshake timeout
body: Expose redirect hop limit and handshake timeout for HTTP/HTTPS banner grabbing.

title: Forensics: add PCAP detect, SHA1, entropy, CSV export
body: Improve forensics hashing and type detection; compute Shannon entropy and support CSV output.

title: Credentials: add htpasswd + NetNTLMv2 parsing and crack templates
body: Detect common container formats and provide ready-made hashcat/john mode templates with JSON results.

title: Docs: expand README with full CLI reference
Chore: clean warnings across feature builds
body: Remove unused imports and gate helpers to achieve clean builds for narrow feature sets.
